Evaluate list members that are formulae, using the map data as the environment

Source: R/layers.R
evalFormula.Rd

Evaluates if provided. Otherwise, the formula environment is evaluated.

Usage

evalFormula(list, data)

Arguments

list

with members as formulae

data

map data
